org.flexiblepower.messaging

Interface Connection


  • public interface Connection

    This object is created by the ConnectionManager when two Endpoints are connected. It will then be provided to them through the Endpoint.onConnect(Connection) method.

    This interface should never be implemented by users

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Port getPort() 
      void sendMessage(java.lang.Object message)
      Sends a message to the other Endpoint.

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(java.lang.Object message)
        Sends a message to the other Endpoint. This message is handled asynchronously, so it will be handled by the other Endpoint on a seperate thread. Only messages of the type as defined in the Port.sends() should be sent.
        Parameters:
        message - The message that is to be sent.

      • getPort

        Port getPort()
        Returns:
        The Port on which this connection has be created.
